data.name: Dominion - Prosperity: 1st Edition
data.detailed_description:
Play with Loan, Trade Route, Talisman, Counting House, Royal Seal, Contraband, Mountebank, Venture and Goons in this set of cards that were included in the original release of Prosperity. The Prosperity expansion first released with twenty five sets of kingdom cards and as the game grew, a second edition was published. The second edition removed nine of the cards we know and love, and added nine new ones. For a nostalgic game, fire up the first edition with this set and play the cards that introduced you to Dominion Prosperity.


This set of cards includes those cards that were originally in the Intrigue expansion, but have been removed for second edition.

Included Cards
  • Loan - A trashing Treasure
  • Trade Route - A terminal trasher with a buy
  • Talisman - A low cost card gainer
  • Counting House - A Copper fetcher
  • Royal Seal - A topdecking Treasure
  • Contraband - A risky Treasure with high payout and a buy
  • Mountebank - A powerful double-junker
  • Venture - A milling Treasure
  • Goons - A powerful handsize attacker


First edition cards can replace second edition cards, or be mixed in, however you choose to play.

Short Description*
Play with Loan, Trade Route, Talisman, Counting House, Royal Seal, Contraband, Mountebank, Venture and Goons in this set of cards that were included in the original release of Prosperity.

data.short_description: Play with classic cards in this set that were included in the original release of Prosperity.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
